title: Campenaerts Races Classified’s Internally Geared Hub With 62-Tooth Chainring
content:
Victor Campenaerts shows why 'bigger is better' with a 62-tooth chainring, marking Classified Cycling's internally gear hub's debut in the World Tour race.

The post Campenaerts Races Classified’s Internally Geared Hub With 62-Tooth Chainring appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
